svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="29.2.9" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Perzeptron Lernregel (Step-Funktion)" id="0"> <mxGraphModel dx="1764" dy="2824" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="sample" parent="1" style="rounded=0;" value="Wähle ein Trainingsbeispiel
(Eingaben x₁, x₂, … + richtige Ausgabe y)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="420" x="-292" y="-1700" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="compute" parent="1" style="rounded=0;" value="Berechne Ausgabe ŷ mit Step-Funktion
(ŷ = 0 oder 1)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="420" x="-292" y="-1590" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="inc" parent="1" style="rounded=0;" value="Erhöhe Gewichte aktiver Eingänge
(xᵢ = 1)
und Bias (w₀)
um Lernrate" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="210" x="-152" y="-1152" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e1" edge="1" parent="1" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;" target="sample"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-82" y="-1730" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e2" edge="1" parent="1" source="sample" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;" target="compute"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-3" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-252" y="-1409" /> <mxPoint x="-252" y="-1225" /> <mxPoint x="-253" y="-1225" /> <mxPoint x="-253" y="-1010" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="-253" y="-1010" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-8" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" target="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="118" y="-1409" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-1" parent="1" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;" value="ŷ = y" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="100" x="-132" y="-1459" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-2" edge="1" parent="1" source="compute" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" target="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-5" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="Ja" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="-262" y="-1433" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-10" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-52" y="-1152" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-16" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="268" y="-1262" /> <mxPoint x="268" y="-1152" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="268" y="-1152" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-7" parent="1" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;" value="y = 1, ŷ = 0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="100" x="58" y="-1312" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-9" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="Nein" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="50" y="-1433" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-13" parent="1" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=7;fontStyle=2" value=""Neuron sollte feuern
feuert aber nicht"" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="68" x="-48" y="-1222" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-17" parent="1" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=7;fontStyle=2" value=""Neuron feuert,
obwohl es nicht soll"" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="64" x="200" y="-1222" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-18" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="Ja" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="-62" y="-1286" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-19" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="Nein" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="214" y="-1286" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-21" parent="1" style="rounded=0;" value="Verringere Gewichte aktiver Eingänge
(xᵢ = 1)
und Bias (w₀)
um Lernrate" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="220" x="158" y="-1152" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-24" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" target="sample"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-402" y="-960" /> <mxPoint x="-402" y="-1660" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="-372" y="-1651.532529633621" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-31" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" target="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-30"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-22" parent="1" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;fontStyle=1;fontSize=9;" value="Trainingsbeispiele 
korrekt?" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="90" width="102" x="-302" y="-1000" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-26" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="Nein" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="-410" y="-985" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-28" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" value="Ja" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="60" x="-124" y="-985" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-29" parent="1" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.start_1;" value="Starte mit kleinen zufälligen Gewichten
zwischen −1 und +1
(inkl. Bias w₀​, Input bleibt immer gleich (x₀ = 1)
Wähle auch eine passende Lernrate 
(Bsp.: η = 0.1)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="170" width="270" x="-217" y="-1900" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-30" parent="1" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.start_1;" value="Trainingsprozess
abgeschlossen" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="78" width="160" x="-162" y="-830" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-36" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-33" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" target="sample"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="109" y="-971" /> <mxPoint x="408" y="-971" /> <mxPoint x="408" y="-1660" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-33" parent="1" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.start_2;whiteSpace=wrap;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="38" x="90" y="-1031" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-34" edge="1" parent="1" source="inc" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" target="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-33"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-35" edge="1" parent="1" source="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-21" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" target="yTU7yDR2iA_o7Difx2ws-33"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 483px; margin-left: 149px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

g.text: (inkl. Bias w₀​, Input bleibt immer gleich (x₀ = 1)
